riotdc.dc:title: Girls to the Front: The True Story of the Riot Grrrl
riotdc.dc:creator: Marcus, Sara, 1977-

riotdc.dc:description: A history of Riot Grrrl, a radical feminist movement that was started in the 1990s by young women who were fed up with sexism and harassment and decided to make some noise.
